data.title: Juilliard Performances
data.meta_description: Juilliard presents more than 800 performances in music, dance, and drama annually—tickets are $50 or less; many are free!  Ovation Society presale begins August 13 and Juilliard Association presale begins August 20 for Friend and Patron; to access presale tickets, login to your account before browsing events. Tickets are on sale to the general public beginning August 29.
